title: Ribbon Fragment, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: printed on plain compound satin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18.3 x 21.8 cm (7 3/16 x 8 9/16 in.)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Short length of ribbon in white satin with a woven metallic pattern of a rose vine is printed in a multi-colored pattern of closely-grouped zinnias.

tombstone.epitaph:
